title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1150.10 - Reporting accidents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1150.10 - Reporting accidents

State Regulations

Any person involved in an accident at a terminal or on a
terminal highway which results in injury or death to any person or damage to
any property, or which may give rise to a claim against the authority, shall
render such assistance as may be needed and make a full report to the manager
as soon as practicable but in no event more than three days thereafter. In the
event that a written report of such accident is required by State or Federal
law, a copy of such report shall also be submitted to the
manager. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21

1150.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
